short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the ancient and mystical atmosphere of Elden Castle every time you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the ancient and mystical atmosphere of Elden Castle every time you open a new tab. This extension transforms your browser with a hauntingly beautiful background, inspired by the eerie and majestic castles from Elden Ring, bringing a touch of mystery and timelessness to your browsing experience.
